void Server::sendData(int x_self,int y_self,int dir_self)
{
 if(isConnected){
 //int[] è½¬ QByteArray
 int self[3] = {x_self,y_self,dir_self};
 QByteArray array;
 array.append((char*)self, sizeof(int) * 3);
 socket.write(array);
 }
}

æ¥æ”¶ä½ç½®

15

void Server::receiveData()
{
 // QByteArray è½¬ int[]
 QByteArray array=socket.readAll();
 int data[3];
 for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
 {
 int unTemp;
 memcpy(&unTemp, array.data() + sizeof(int) * i, sizeof(int));
 data[i] = unTemp;
 }
 x=data[0];
 y=data[1];
 dir=data[2];
}

void Enemy::chase(Player *p1, Player *p2)
{
 int Xp1=p1->getX(),Yp1=p1->getY(),Xp2=p2->getX(),Yp2=p2->getY();
 int disP1=(x-Xp1)*(x-Xp1)+(y-Yp1)*(y-Yp1);
 int disP2=(x-Xp2)*(x-Xp2)+(y-Yp2)*(y-Yp2);
 if(disP1<disP2){
 if(x<Xp1){
 x+=speed;
 enemy->setPixmap(enemy_r);
 }
 else if(x>Xp1){
 x-=speed;
 enemy->setPixmap(enemy_l);
 }
 if(y<Yp1){
 y+=speed;
 }
 else if(y>Yp1){
 y-=speed;
 }
 }
 else{
 if(x<Xp2){
 x+=speed;
 enemy->setPixmap(enemy_r);
 }
 else if(x>Xp2){
 x-=speed;
 enemy->setPixmap(enemy_l);
 }
 if(y<Yp2){
 y+=speed;
 }
 else if(y>Yp2){
 y-=speed;
 }
 }
}

void delay(int msec)
{
 QTime dieTime= QTime::currentTime().addMSecs(msec);
 while( QTime::currentTime() < dieTime )
 QCoreApplication::processEvents(QEventLoop::AllEvents, 100);
}

int main(int,char**) {
 if (SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO)) {
 SDL_Log("Cannot Init Video,%s", SDL_GetError());
 return 1;
 }
 SDL_Window* win = SDL_CreateWindow(
 "Title",
 SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED,
 SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED,
 400, 300, SDL_WINDOW_SHOWN
 );
 if (win == NULL) {
 SDL_Log("Cannot Create Window,%s",SDL_GetError());
 return 1;
 }
 SDL_Delay(3000); //å»¶è¿Ÿ3000æ¯«ç§’

 SDL_DestroyWindow(win);
 SDL_Quit();
 return 0;
}
